thread.title: Wisconsin Lottery: Record 'Fast Play' jackpot hits for $583K | FOX6 Milwaukee
thread.title_full: Wisconsin Lottery: Record 'Fast Play' jackpot hits for $583K | FOX6 Milwaukee

author: FOX6 News Digital Team
title: Wisconsin Lottery: Record 'Fast Play' jackpot hits for $583K | FOX6 Milwaukee
text:
Wisconsin Lottery: Record 'Fast Play' jackpot hits for $583K By FOX6 News Digital Team Published December 26, 2024 3:44pm CST Money FOX6 News Milwaukee Share
Copy Link Email Facebook Twitter LinkedIn Reddit article Record "Fast Play" progressive jackpot, winning ticket sold in Sheboygan (Courtesy: Wisconsin Lottery)
The Brief A Wisconsin Lottery player won a record "Fast Play" progressive jackpot on Tuesday. The $10 ticket, sold in Sheboygan, hit for $583,746. Wisconsin Lottery said the odds of winning are 1 in 240,000. SHEBOYGAN, Wis. - A Wisconsin Lottery player on Tuesday won the largest "Fast Play" progressive jackpot since the game debuted.
The player won 100% of the $583,746 jackpot. The $10 ticket was sold in Sheboygan. Wisconsin Lottery said the odds of winning are 1 in 240,000.
SIGN UP TODAY: Get daily headlines, breaking news emails from FOX6 News
The previous Fast Play jackpot record was $403,497, Wisconsin Lottery said – won in 2023 on a ticket sold in Nekoosa in 2023.
Unlike other games, Wisconsin Lottery said the Fast Play progressive jackpot can be won as soon as the ticket is purchased. The amount depends on the ticket price purchased by the player: $1 tickets win 10% of the jackpot, $2 tickets win 20%, $5 tickets win 50% and $10 tickets win 100%.
The Fast Play progressive jackpot game debuted on April 23, 2023.

The Source Information in this report is from the Wisconsin Lottery.
